[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [ISharedCopyStaticAssetsConfiguration](./heft.isharedcopystaticassetsconfiguration.md) &gt; [excludeGlobs](./heft.isharedcopystaticassetsconfiguration.excludeglobs.md)

## ISharedCopyStaticAssetsConfiguration.excludeGlobs property

Globs that should be explicitly excluded. This takes precedence over globs listed in "includeGlobs" and files that match the file extensions provided in "fileExtensions".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
excludeGlobs?: string[];
```
